description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
What's Changed
- [stable-4.0] fix(accessmanager): only handle manual redirects unless specified otherwise by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#9352
- [stable-4.0] fix(appimage): ensure more libraries are bundled in the AppImage by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#9356
- [stable-4.0] ci: Remove Ubuntu Plucky, add Resolute by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#9355
- [stable-4.0] fix(AppImage): bundle OpenGL drivers in the AppImage by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#9365
Full Changelog: nextcloud/desktop@v4.0.5...v4.0.6
